history.heading: Equipment designed to heat a semiconductor wafer to a temperature greater than 1000 °C (1832 °F) for a 'duration' less than 2 ms.

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”
3B993 Specified semiconductor manufacturing equipment as follows (see list of items controls).
Annealing equipment designed for 300 mm wafers as follows:
history.text:
Equipment designed to heat a semiconductor wafer to a temperature greater than 1000 °C (1832 °F) for a 'duration' less than 2 ms.
Technical Note: For the purposes of 3B993.o.2, 'duration' is the period above stated temperature.
